name: iKompass
description: Ikompass primary area of focus is Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Project Management, Cyber Security and Serverless technologies.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Courses  for   Singapore Professionals
ShortDescription: We are an education organization specializing in a niche set of courses and skills.

Highlights.name: Industry Experts and Flexible Course Formats
Highlights.description: iKompass offers data science courses taught by industry experts [1]. The courses are offered in a variety of formats, including physical classroom, virtual live classroom, and online [1]. This means that iKompass can provide students with a learning experience that meets their needs and preferences.

Highlights.name: Courses for Beginners and Experts
Highlights.description: iKompass offers courses that are designed for both beginners and experts [1]. This means that iKompass can provide students with the level of instruction they need to succeed in their data science studies.

Highlights.name: Learn in Person or Online
Highlights.description: Students can choose to learn in person or online [1]. This flexibility allows students to choose the learning format that best suits their needs and lifestyle.

enhanced_description: iKompass is an education organization established in 2009 and headquartered in Singapore, specializing in a niche set of courses and skills for Singaporean professionals. Its primary focus areas include Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Project Management, Cyber Security, and Serverless technologies. The platform offers on-demand and live courses, including Big Data and Robotic Process Automation, which are taught by industry experts. Courses are designed for both beginners and experts and are delivered in flexible formats, including physical classroom, virtual live classroom, and online. As a learning and development solution, iKompass functions as a corporate LMS and training provider, aiming to help organizations build a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
key_use_cases: Corporate learning and development for technical skills
Upskilling and reskilling employees in Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, Project Management, Cyber Security, and Serverless technologies
Implementing training programs for Big Data and Robotic Process Automation
Supporting initiatives to build a more diverse and inclusive workforce through skill development
competitive_advantages: Specialization in high-demand technology areas (Data Science, ML, AI, Cyber Security, Serverless)
Flexible course formats (physical, virtual live, online) to suit diverse learning needs
Offers content for both beginners and experts in various technical domains
implementation_scenarios: Integration into existing corporate training programs
Deployment within organizational Learning & Development departments
Support for employee upskilling initiatives in technology domains
roi_benefits: Contribution to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce
Development of critical technical skills within the employee base
Enhanced employee capabilities through expert-led and flexible training
primary_users: HR and Learning & Development managers overseeing corporate training
Individuals interested in Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, Project Management, Cyber Security, and Serverless technologies
